EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Freshop Newsletter- February 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly: February 2022 Happy New Year Can you believe it is actually 2022? Don’t forget: the new year means all information, including manifest, data files, etc., sent to Freshop needs to be updated with the new date: 2022! NCR Freshop Knowledgebase Learn how to use the Freshop Admin by accessing our library of articles in the Freshop knowledge base <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/freshop]]> to better manage your store. Reports There are various Reports <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/reports]]> that can be generated from activity on your site that can be accessed from the Freshop Admin dashboard. Report options include: orders, sales, users, carts & lists, fulfillment, search terms, products, promotions & adds and circulars. Insights Dashboard The Insights Dashboard <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/insights-dashboard-24-1-2022]]> helps with tracking trends in slot utilization, assessing consumer loyalty, showing the efficiency of their pickers, and showing a stores order statistics by order type.  - User Duration - Slot Utilization - Pick Performance - Store Map - Orders Promotions Learn how you can add and track Promotions <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/promotions-16-8-2018-1]]> in the Freshop Admin dashboard. You can view current & past promotions as well as add a promotion. Remember to always test a new promotion! NCR Freshop will be at NGA! WHEN: February 27 – March 1 WHERE: Caesar’s Palace, Las Vegas, NV We’re thrilled to be participating in the 2022 NGA show this month and we hope to see you there! Our industry-leaders will be demonstrating our new, innovative NCR Freshop product features and uncovering what we have planned for this year. Come visit us at our booth #1219! Will we see you there? ${CTAText3} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> ${CTA2Text4} <[[${CTA2URL}?${url-parameter}]]> Thank you!
